content: Question I received during a training course: is there a (published) mapping between the CTS2 object model and FHIR terminology resources? Those asking have a CTS2 compliant server and are seeking to build a FHIR interface (for at least expanded value sets, but maybe more in future).
there is a draft thing, but it's not published currently. look in subversion in \guides\cts2
but it's.... off on a tangent from what they want.
@Harold Solbrig and I are working on CTS2/FHIR terminology service alignment at the operational level now. I recommend you connect them with Harold
